DOC.brief_summary: To determine statin therapy plus intravenous normal saline , patient chronic renal insufficiency undergo angiography , superior placebo plus intravenous normal saline therapy prevention CIN .
DOC.detailed_description: Due conflict available data , practice guideline establish order prevent contrast-induced nephropathy ( CIN ) . Our goal determine statin therapy plus intravenous normal saline , patient chronic renal insufficiency undergo angiography , superior placebo plus intravenous normal saline therapy prevention CIN .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Adults > 18 year age undergoing coronary peripheral angiography without intervention Cr > 1.3 mg/dL GFR < 60 mL/min 2. endstage renal disease dialysis acute renal failure previous iodinate contrast medium exposure within 7 day study entry history hypersensitivity statins pregnancy lactation emergent coronary angiography , ST elevation myocardial infarction ( STEMI ) , cardiogenic shock prisoner patient already maximum dose statin patient receive Nacetylcysteine sodium bicarbonate
